subtitleNullable: Reviews and Ratings for Sentiment Analysis
descriptionNullable:
This Dataset contains information of Review, Rate, Summary and Sentiment . The dataset can be used for application like Sentiment Analysis.

This dataset contains total 100000 rows and 4 columns. Using Customer Review or Summary you can use it for sentiment Analysis purpose such as Positive, Negative and neutral Reviews.

Data was scraped from https://www.flipkart.com/
